Object.Field: alter table SNP_AGENT drop constraint FK_AGENT_ESS
alter table SNP_INDEX_TYPE drop constraint FK_INDEXTYPE_TECHN
alter table SNP_ACTION alter ACTION_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_AGENT alter HOST_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_CONNECT alter JAVA_DRIVER type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_CONNECT alter JNDI_FACTORY type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_CONNECT alter JNDI_RESSOURCE type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_CONNECT alter JNDI_USER type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_CONNECT alter USER_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_DATASOURCE alter JNDI_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_ESS alter INITIAL_CTX_FACTORY type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_ESS alter SECU_PRINCIPAL type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_ESS alter SECU_CREDENTIALS type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_ESS alter PROVIDER_URL type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_ESS alter MDS_JNDI_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_ESS alter RTS_JNDI_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_FLEX_FIELD alter FF_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_GRP_ACTION alter GRP_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_HOST alter HOST_IP_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_LANG_ELT alter LE_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "128", "")?>
alter table SNP_LE_TECHNO alter LT_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "128", "")?>
alter table SNP_LINE_ACTION alter LINE_ACTION_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_LOC_REP alter REP_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "128", "")?>
alter table SNP_LOC_REP alter JPS_USERNAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_PSCHEMA alter EXT_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_PSCHEMA alter CATALOG_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "128", "")?>
alter table SNP_PSCHEMA alter SCHEMA_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "128", "")?>
alter table SNP_PSCHEMA alter WSCHEMA_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "128", "")?>
alter table SNP_PSCHEMA alter WCATALOG_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "128", "")?>
alter table SNP_REM_REP alter REP_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "128", "")?>
alter table SNP_SOLUTION alter SOL_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_SOL_ELT alter OBJ_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_SUB_LANG alter SL_NAME type <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?>
alter table SNP_TECHNO add JOIN_NATURAL <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "50", "")?> NULL
create index DS_AGENT_FK on SNP_DATASOURCE ( I_AGENT )
create index DS_CONNECT_FK on SNP_DATASOURCE ( I_CONNECT )
create index SNP_ACTION_FK1 on SNP_ACTION ( I_GRP_ACTION )
create index IDXTYPE_TEC_FK1 on SNP_INDEX_TYPE ( I_TECHNO )
alter table SNP_ACTION add constraint FK_ACT_GRP_ACT foreign key ( I_GRP_ACTION ) references SNP_GRP_ACTION ( I_GRP_ACTION )
alter table SNP_INDEX_TYPE add constraint FK_IDXTYPE_TEC foreign key ( I_TECHNO ) references SNP_TECHNO ( I_TECHNO )
